    • Constructor Detail

      • SinglesTrigger2019

        public SinglesTrigger2019(E source,
                          List<CalorimeterHit> hodoHitList,
                          Map<Integer,HodoscopePattern> patternMap,
                          int triggerNum,
                          int topnbot)
        Instantiates a new SinglesTrigger with all cut states set to false and with the trigger source defined according to the specified object.
        Parameters:
        source - - The object from which the trigger cut states are derived.
        hodoHitList - - list of hodoscope hits
        patternMap - - map of hodoscope patterns
        triggerNum - - trigger type
        topnbot - - top or bot
